function* sports(one) { let two = yield one; let param = yield one + two; yield param + one; } const obj = sports(10); console.log(obj.next()); // {value: 10, done: false} console.log(obj.next()); // {value: NaN, done: false} console.log(obj.next(20)); // {value: 30, done: false} console.log(obj.next()); // {value: undefined, done: true}
